a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of suicides: comparison of sources
This is compared between the WHO Mortality Database (reported data submitted from each country), IHME
GBD (modeled estimates), and WHO Global Health Estimates (reported data with adjustment for
underreporting; or GBD estimates in countries lacking functioning vital registries).
Data source: WHO Mortality Database (2024); World Health Organization (2024); IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
Note: Sources may have different estimates of the total population size of countries.
